Tournament Admin Commands.
eventmatch - Used to open Tournament Menu. eventmatch Can be used to create match on specified arena as : eventmatch create [arena_id] [blue_team_name] [red_team_name]
eventcreate - Used to create GvG arena. eventcreate [blue_team_name] [red_team_name] (arena_id)
eventdispel - Used to set teamleaders and teleport all to arena. eventdispel [blue_team_leader] [red_team_leader]
eventview - Used to set viewer and teleport him on arena. eventview [player]
eventmsg - Used to chat for all on arena. eventmsg [message]
eventstart - Used to countdown start round.
eventend - Used to stop round, autoset winner of round and update score.
eventscore - Used to manualy set score. eventscore [blue_team_score] [red_team_score]
eventarena - Used to switch arena. eventscore [arena_id]
eventremove - Used to set stop GvG and teleport back.
Character Modify Commands, Page 4
